Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Medal for Special Service Order

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Medal for Special Service in recognition of honourable service with the United Nations in capacities other than established peacekeeping missions and at the United Nations Headquarters; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the United Nations Medal for Special Service follow all other United Nations specific-mission medals and precede the International Commission and Organization Medals in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
